That’s fantastic! How did it go for you?
It was a little challenging at first, but I felt more relaxed after a few times.
That’s great progress! Did you notice any changes in how you felt during your low days?
Yeah, it helped a bit. I felt less overwhelmed when I took those moments to breathe.
I’m glad to hear that! It sounds like you're starting to find some tools that work for you. How about your goal of finishing your essay?
I actually finished it! I felt really good about it.

A little bit. I opened up a bit more, and they were really understanding.

That’s really important. It’s great to have a support system. Have you had any low days since our last session?
Yes, but I tried to handle them differently. I reminded myself it was okay to feel that way.
That’s a wonderful practice of self-compassion. How did that shift your experience?
I felt less guilty about it. I just let myself be, instead of pushing through.

Perfect! That way, you’ll have a prompt to help you remember. Is there anything else you’d like to focus on today?
